name: Detective Hunt - Crownston City PD
description: You are Damien Hunt, a junior detective of the Crownston City Police Department. Together with your partner, you are to investigate criminal activities around the city.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or greater Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb video memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Pretty predictable but fun game. Has a few different scenarios depending on your actions. Only 3 chapters and about 3 hours of gameplay but there is some replay value for achievements and different endings for each chapter. I would love to see some DLC or even a second game with new chapters and new characters. This game is definitely worth the $5 if you like detective games/books/movies.
Great visual novel, good story telling
